import React, { Component } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { PageTurn, FirstPageLoaded } from "../../store/actions/pageactions"; const mapStateToProps = state => { return { store: state }; }; class ToConnectNavigation extends Component { componentDidMount() { if (!this.props.store.page.firstpageloaded) { let firstpage = this.props.location.pathname.split("/")[1]; if (firstpage === "") { firstpage = "home"; } this.props.dispatch(PageTurn(firstpage)); this.props.dispatch(FirstPageLoaded()); this.refs.buttons.childNodes[ ["home", "about", "portfolio", "contact"].indexOf(firstpage) ].childNodes[0].classList.add("active"); } } render() { return (

AMAN KUMAR

); } } const Navigation = connect(mapStateToProps)(ToConnectNavigation); export default Navigation;
